statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.PartnerID , AA.EmployeeID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate , AA.Description
, EE.Name as EmployeeName , EE.EmployeeType , EE.EmployeeNo , EE.Email , EE.PhoneNo , EE.MobileNo , EE.FaxNo
, M1.Name as EmployeeTypeName
FROM dbo.TPartnerManager AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.TEmployee EE WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.EmployeeID = EE.ID LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON EE.EmployeeType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'EmployeeType' WHERE AA.PartnerID = #PartnerID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.* , EE.Name as EmployeeName
FROM dbo.TPartnerManager AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TEmployee EE WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.EmployeeID = EE.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TPartnerManager ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, PartnerID, EmployeeID, StartDate, EndDate, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #PartnerID#, #EmployeeID#, #StartDate#, #EndDate#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TPartnerManager SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, PartnerID = #PartnerID# , EmployeeID = #EmployeeID# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
statements.select: SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TPartnerManager AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.PartnerID = #PartnerID# AND AA.StartDate = #StartDate#

SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TPartnerManager AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.PartnerID = #PartnerID# AND AA.StartDate = (SELECT MAX(StartDate) FROM dbo.TPartnerManager WHERE PartnerID = #PartnerID# AND StartDate < #StartDate# )

SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TPartnerManager AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.PartnerID = #PartnerID# AND AA.StartDate = (SELECT MIN(StartDate) FROM dbo.TPartnerManager WHERE PartnerID = #PartnerID# AND StartDate > #StartDate# )
statements.update: UPDATE dbo.TPartnerManager SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName# , EndDate = #EndDate# WHERE ID = #ID#
